title: WATCH: Carpe Donktum created a PERFECT parody of that awful NYT-Star Wars video
text:
This was inevitable and we must say, very well done. Have a watch:

My response to the @nytopinion Star Wars Meme. The Left Can't Meme… Period. pic.twitter.com/olCkzLPcvc — Carpe Donktum🔹 (@CarpeDonktum) September 27, 2019

And for comparison purposes, here is the awful original one from the New York Times:

"The president has launched a fresh assault on fair elections." Unfortunately, this isn't happening a long time ago in a universe far, far away. pic.twitter.com/EUuAptsKJv — New York Times Opinion (@nytopinion) September 27, 2019

***

‘Destroying your paper to own the libs’? NYT’s Sarah Jeong seems to be urging subscribers to cancel their subscriptions https://t.co/iIIAauKhGT — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 27, 2019

‘Don’t BEG, it’s a bad look’: Jill Filipovic pleads with Tweeps NOT to cancel their NYT subscription in hilariously pathetic thread https://t.co/ZwIBbFaCuf — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 27, 2019
